means: 发射，播送，广播( transmit的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The information is electronically transmitted to schools and colleges.
sentence.Network_cn: 信息通过电子方式传送到各所学校和学院。

sentence.Network_en: Audio signals can be transmitted along cables without distortion.
sentence.Network_cn: 声音信号可以通过电缆传送而不失真。

sentence.Network_en: He transmitted his keen enjoyment of singing to the audience.
sentence.Network_cn: 他把自己对演唱的激情投入传递给了观众。

PerfectNetExp.abs: tetanus is not transmitted person to person but is caused by a toxin released by the anaerobic tetanus bacillus Clostridium tetani .破伤风的传播途径不是从人到人，而是由厌氧性破伤风杆菌释放的有毒物质造成。

the official said that they are now concerned that the H5N1 avian influenza virus would mutate to a new kind of virus and the virus would be transmitted from human to human someday .这名官员说他们现在担心H5N1禽流感病毒可能会变异成为一种新病毒，最终会以人传人的方式传播。
" These findings are releant not only for SARS , " he concluded , " but also for other infections transmitted by droplets as influenza .这些发现的意义不仅仅局限于SARS，而且适用于其它通过飞沫传播的疾病，比如流感。孙博士最后说。

scientists in 1995 and 1996 , the study confirmed , HIV-1 ( one of the two types of HIV ) at least 10 different genetic subtypes , and may be transmitted on different .科学家在1995年和1996年的研究证实，HIV-1（两类HIV之一)至少存在10种不同的基因亚型，并可能在传播性上有所不同。

transmitting aerial 发射天线transmitting antenna 发射天线transmitting directing 发射方向

entry.def: When radio and television programmes, computer data, or other electronic messages are transmitted, they are sent from one place to another, using wires, radio waves, or satellites.

example.ex: The game was transmitted live in Spain and Italy...
example.tran: 这场比赛在西班牙和意大利进行了现场直播。

example.ex: The information is electronically transmitted to schools and colleges…
example.tran: 信息通过电子方式传送到各所学校和学院。

entry.def: If one person or animal transmits a disease to another, they have the disease and cause the other person or animal to have it.

example.tran: 传染疾病给人类的蚊子

example.ex: There was no danger of transmitting the infection through operations.
example.tran: 不存在通过手术传播这种传染病的风险。

entry.def: If you transmit an idea or feeling to someone else, you make them understand and share the idea or feeling.

example.ex: The message they are transmitting to their daughters is very different from that of previous generations…
example.tran: 他们向女儿传输的信息与上几代人截然不同。

example.ex: He transmitted his keen enjoyment of singing to the audience.
example.tran: 他把自己对演唱的激情投入传递给了观众。

entry.def: If an object or substance transmits something such as sound or electrical signals, the sound or signals are able to pass through it.

example.ex: These thin crystals transmit much of the power...
example.tran: 这些薄薄的晶体传导了大部分的动力。

example.ex: There was no vibration transmitted to the handles and the machine wasn't noisy either.
example.tran: 没有任何振动传导到手柄，机器也没有任何噪音。

means.word_mean: 1. sent electronically as by wire or radio;
2. tending to occur among members of a family usually by heredity;

auth_sentence.content: Causes of gonorrhoea Gonorrhoea is a sexually transmitted infection.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Causes of gonorrhoea Gonorrhoea is a sexually transmitted infection.

auth_sentence.content: Have an untreated sexually transmitted infection or pelvic infection.
auth_sentence.res_content: Have an untreated sexually transmitted infection or pelvic infection.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Have an untreated sexually transmitted infection or pelvic infection.

auth_sentence.content: Each disease is transmitted by a different genetic trait.
auth_sentence.res_content: Each disease is transmitted by a different genetic trait.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Each disease is transmitted by a different genetic trait.

Sentence.sentence: Some people in the town have become ill from deer transmitted diseases.
